channel.title: CVE Feed for ESi Technology -- AIM LINE Marketing Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESi Technology -- AIM LINE Marketing Platform

item.title: CVE-2024-9982|2024-10-15T08:04:36.002Z -- esi%20technology -- aim%20line%20marketing%20platform
item.description: AIM LINE Marketing Platform from Esi Technology does not properly validate a specific query parameter. When the LINE Campaign Module is enabled, unauthenticated remote attackers can inject arbitrary FetchXml commands to read, modify, and delete database content.
